About

Patricia is a self-taught Front End Web Developer based out of Austin, Texas.

She was born and raised in Cuba. You can always find Patricia at her neighborhood coffee shop, working on her newest project. She is always working on something new, or improving an old project. When not working or studying, Patricia likes to spend her time outside. Climbing, backpacking and hinking are some her favorite activities.

Not commonly known facts:

  • Patricia is a metal head .\../
  • She loves craft beer and occasionally homebrewing
